name: autocomposer-melody
description: A web app that displays simple musical melodies based on a chord progression

scripts.build-dev: browserify src/app-main.js -o dist/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ react ] ] && stylus src/style.styl -o dist/style.css
scripts.build-prod: browserify src/app-main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ react ] ] | uglifyjs -o dist/index.js && stylus src/style.styl -o dist/style.css

author: RJ Salvador
